channel.title: Where do I start?
channel.description:
Hello mates,
So with the help of moparscape members, I will be using Hyperion as my base and later on apollo. But where do I start? There are so many things that need to be done...Are skills complete? Is there a list of things to do and finished somewhere for Hyperion?
Thanks
P.S: Keep in mind that Im just returning to rsps and to a non-delta base, so I have no idea whats going on... :confused:

item.title: Where do I start?
item.dc:creator: @AliAbid AliAbid
item.description:
@AliAbid wrote:

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Where do I start?
item.dc:creator: @jummppy jummppy
item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

Really just start with making sure everything works. Ex: wearing items, object clicking. all of that sorts. After that i would write skills and so on

Read full topic

item.title: Where do I start?
item.dc:creator: @AliAbid AliAbid
item.description:
@AliAbid wrote:

I have never seen a done hyperion before, could you link me?

Read full topic

item.title: Where do I start?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Well the original hyperion doesn’t have much done other than some packets and maybe some little requirements(iirc)

Some things based off of hyperion obviously have more, so just check those threads.

Read full topic
